short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and edit sticky notes on any site. 1. Create it | 2. Drag and position it | 3. Save it for the next visit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create, position, and edit sticky notes on any web page, at any time! Save the sticky notes and the next time you return to the page, they will be just as you left them.
